langpack.str: Process Dashboard
Process Dashboard

The core Process Dashboard application.
The Process Dashboard is distributed under the terms of the GNU General Public License.
PSP(SM) Processes

Templates, scripts, and forms supporting the Personal Software Process(SM).
This module incorporates templates, scripts, and other materials from the document "PSP Materials.doc" copyright (c) 2006 by Carnegie Mellon University. These materials are reproduced with the permission of the Software Engineering Institute.
The Software Engineering Institute requires that you consent to an additional license agreement to download, install and use this module.
PSP(SM) for Engineers

Support for students taking the SEI's Personal Software Process(SM) courses, PSP for Engineers I & II.
This module incorporates templates, scripts, and other materials from the document "PSP Materials.doc" copyright (c) 2006 by Carnegie Mellon University. These materials are reproduced with the permission of the Software Engineering Institute.
The Software Engineering Institute requires that you consent to an additional license agreement to download, install and use this module.
PSP(SM) Fundamentals & Advanced

Support for students taking the SEI's Personal Software Process(SM) courses, PSP Fundamentals & PSP Advanced.
This module incorporates templates, scripts, and other materials from the document "PSP Materials.doc" copyright (c) 2006 by Carnegie Mellon University. These materials are reproduced with the permission of the Software Engineering Institute.
The Software Engineering Institute requires that you consent to an additional license agreement to download, install and use this module.
PSP(SM) Instructor Tools
Tools to assist instructors of the PSP courses
JavaHelp(TM) Help Browser

Help browser from Sun Microsystems.
This module is not required for full functionality of the Process Dashboard. However, installing this module will provide enhanced browsing of the Process Dashboard help documentation, including full-text search capabilities.
The contents of this module are copyrighted by Sun Microsystems and are not open source. Sun Microsystems requires that you consent to an additional license agreement to download and install this module.
Charting and Reporting Extensions

Charting and Reporting Extensions from Tuma Solutions, LLC.
This module is not required for full functionality of the Process Dashboard. However, installing this module will provide enhanced functionality for charting, reporting, and analysis of your data.
The contents of this module are copyrighted by Tuma Solutions, LLC, and are not open source. Tuma Solutions requires that you consent to an additional license agreement to download and install this module.
Relational Database Extensions

Relational Database Extensions from Tuma Solutions, LLC.
This module is not required for full functionality of the Process Dashboard. However, installing this module will significantly improve the performance and scalability of the application, and will enable external access to project data via SQL queries.
The contents of this module are copyrighted by Tuma Solutions, LLC, and are not open source. Tuma Solutions requires that you consent to an additional license agreement to download and install this module.
Tools for Team Leaders
Tools enabling team leaders to create and manage team projects.
You have chosen to install the JavaHelp(TM) software, written by Sun Microsystems. To download and install this optional module, you must consent to the following license agreement.

str.txt: You have indicated that you do not consent to this license\nagreement. Would you like to remove the module(s)
Select a directory for your personal metrics data :
You must select a data directory.
Select a directory for team configuration data :

langpack.str:
The directory you select will be used to store configuration information for the Team Dashboard.
Most teams should choose a shared network directory, where the files will be accessible to all members of the team.
If several people (for example: team leader, planning manager, coach) all need access to the Team Dashboard, they should all enter the same network directory path in this field.

str.txt: You must select a data directory.

langpack.str:
If you are running the Process Dashboard right now, installing new files can cause unpredictable errors. It is therefore imperative that you shut down the Dashboard if it is currently running.
If you are installing the Process Dashboard for the first time, or if you are not currently running the Process Dashboard, you can ignore this warning.
Otherwise, shut down any currently running instances of the Process Dashboard before you click the "Next" button.
This installer has detected that an instance of the Process Dashboard is currently running on this machine. You must shut it down before you can proceed.
The directory already exists. The Process Dashboard installation in the given directory will be safely updated with new and changed application files. Is this what you would like to do?
